short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculadora con ticket que guarda historial y permite consultar operaciones por fecha.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sampi Calc - Advanced Calculator with History Log

Streamline your cash management process with the Cash Register Calculator extension. Designed for businesses and individuals alike, this user-friendly tool combines advanced arithmetic capabilities with powerful logging features to replace outdated physical calculators.

Key Features:

Real-Time Calculations: Perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division seamlessly.
Detailed Transaction Logs: Automatically record your calculations with timestamps for future reference.
Multi-Language Support: Switch between English, Spanish, Chinese, and Hindi with just a click.
History Access: Easily view or download logs by date for accountability and auditing.
Customizable Interface: Move the calculator window freely across your browser and switch display preferences.
Thousand Separators: Read numbers more easily with formatted results, such as "1,000.00."
Why Choose Cash Register Calculator?

Replace expensive physical devices with a modern, software-based solution.
Keep your data safe with local storage – no internet required for calculations.
Ideal for businesses, cashiers, accountants, and anyone who needs an efficient calculation tool.
How It Works:

Open the calculator via the Chrome toolbar.
Perform calculations and let the app automatically log your operations.
Review and manage logs in an intuitive interface – view online or download as text files.
Upgrade your productivity today with the Cash Register Calculator extension!
